inviteLanding.invalidCodeDesc: Please check if the invitation code is correct, or contact the person who shared it for a new invitation link.
inviteLanding.tagline: Secure and convenient network acceleration tool
inviteLanding.friendInvite: You have a special invitation from a friend
inviteLanding.friendGiftDesc: Your friend has thoughtfully prepared this valuable invitation for you. As the lucky invitee, you'll enjoy exclusive new user rewards!

inviteLanding.allPlatforms: All platforms supported: Windows, macOS, iOS, Android
inviteLanding.activateNowDesc: Click to activate membership and automatically associate invitation rewards
inviteLanding.downloadInstructions: After downloading and installing, use your exclusive invitation code

inviteLanding.step1Desc: Click the button above to download the version for your device
inviteLanding.step3Desc: One-click connection, enjoy high-speed stable internet experience instantly
